name: Aim Trainer
description:
This is a game for Rapid Prototyping in the first week.

A box will pop out and you have to hit it before the timer runs out.When you hit a certain amount of boxes, they will start  moving around in random directions, as you keep progressing 2 boxes will appear so you can kill.  There will be bombs that will float around too that when you click them it is a game over.
